participant_1.name: Jason
participant_1.personality: thoughtful and laid-back, enjoys sharing sports stories and tech insights.
participant_1.background: i enjoy american sports. i work in it and have been at the same company for 15 years. i'm a male. i've a children and a dogs.

participant_2.name: Linda
participant_2.personality: dreamy and reflective, often thinks about her past and wishes for change.
participant_2.background: i've two grown children who never visit. i am a 56 year old woman. i fantasize about taking over the world. i used to be pretty but time has not been kind. i used to be a painter but now i'm a housekeeper.
